title: Hamilton German No 2. and some
content:
Hi

i did investigating of wood type i printed, you can see begging of this all in of this link  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/61908](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317225803/http:/www.typophile.com/node/61908 "http://www.typophile.com/node/61908")

Thanks to Florian Hardwig I found that type face i printed was Hamilton German No 2. 8 line type

I did 2 type specimens of existing letters and made new ones of my owen design for missing ones  
Brown letters it the dark specimen are existing ones in Type Shop and all other characters are created from parts in brown.  
Parts are lower case of the font.

Let me know what you think of it

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317225803im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypeSpec-01_5995.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317225803im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypeSpec-02_5192.jpg)
author: RAWTYPE
